訂.definition: to agree; to conclude; to draw up; to subscribe to (a newspaper etc); to order

訂位.definition: to reserve a seat; to book a table; reservation

訂做.definition: to make to order; to have sth made to order

訂出.definition: to lay down (a rule, a plan of action); to draw up; booked out (i.e. already fully booked)

訂定.definition: to set; to designate; to stipulate; to provide; to draw up; to formulate (rules etc); stipulation

訂書機.definition: stapler; stapling machine; bookbinding machine; CL:臺|台[tai2]

訂票.definition: to book tickets; to issue tickets

訂立.definition: to conclude (treaty, contract, agreement etc); to set up (a rule etc)

訂製.definition: custom-made; made-to-order; to have sth custom made

訂親.definition: variant of 定親|定亲[ding4 qin1]

訂貨.definition: to order goods; to place an order

訂購.definition: to place an order; to subscribe

訂金.definition: an initial payment; earnest money; deposit
